title: LOCKDOWNniversary, Cocaine Bear Is A Thing 3.11.21
itunes:title: LOCKDOWNniversary, Cocaine Bear Is A Thing 3.11.21
description:
In episode 829, Jack and Miles are joined by Bechdel Cast's Caitlin Durante to discuss the one year anniversary of Tom Hanks catching coronavirus and the NBA shut down, Trump being investigated by Georgia prosecutor, the GOP coming for the covid relief bill, religion and politics, the new movie Cocaine Bear, Avatar coming to movies in China, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Rita Wilson Marks Anniversary Of Her And Husband Tom Hanks Contracting Covid-19
  2. One Year Later, Rudy Gobert Is at Peace. And Thriving.
  3. Exclusive: Georgia prosecutor probing Trump taps leading racketeering attorney
  4. Scott Wildly (And Falsely) Claims COVID Relief Bill Will Hurt Poor Families Amid Scattered GOP Response
  5. America Without God
  6. Cocaine Bear: the must-see and must-avoid movie of 2022
  7. 'Avatar' to Get Surprise Re-Release in China (Exclusive)
  8. Maybe Everyone Wants to Go Back to Movie Theaters After All?
  9. ‘Avatar’ Rerelease In China Is Not Just About Dethroning ‘Avengers: Endgame’
  10. Avatar Backlash In China
  11. Why Did China Kill 'Avatar'?
  12. LISTEN: DeeDONTCARE - How We_Du It.[105.25]

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
